# Support

Thank you for using this CLI tool to build your Agent Skills! If you need help, please review the following options:

## ğŸ“š Documentation

- See the [README](README.md) for setup and usage instructions.
- Review the [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) guide for development and PR tips.

## ğŸ Bug Reports

- Please open an issue on GitHub with clear steps to reproduce, expected vs. actual behavior, and any relevant logs or screenshots.

## ğŸ’¡ Feature Requests

- Open a GitHub issue labeled as a feature request. Describe your use case and why it would be helpful.

## ğŸ› ï¸ Self-Service

- Check closed issues and discussions for similar questions or solutions.
- Search the [Agent Skills documentation](https://agentskills.io/home) and the documentation for using agent skills with your chosen coding agent. General support for agent skills will not be provided here and all questions should be directed to the applicable support channels. Issues or discussions not related to this CLI tool may be closed with no notice or comments.

---

Thank you for helping make this project better! If you have feedback on the support process, please open an issue.
